title: Lagos Only Comes Alive At Night
summary: Freelancer to design and run a marketing campaign that mixes spy-thriller flair with modern Web3 culture, driving buzz, sign-ups, and community engagement. The campaign should feel cinematic, stylish, and irresistible to both Bond fans and NFT collectors.

contact.name: Tilly Burzinsky
contact.title: Events Lead
contact.bio: Dynamic events professional specializing in large-scale corporate and cultural events. Expert in creating memorable experiences that bring communities together.

milestones.description: Develop a campaign theme that merges James Bond aesthetics (sleek, high-stakes, iconic) with NFT/Web3 culture. Produce branded assets, teaser visuals, and a promotional content calendar.
